headline.main: VICHY HELD NEAR NEW ORDER ENTRY; But Cabinet Still Seems to Be Split on Use of Fleet and Bases for Germany VICHY HELD NEAR NEW ORDER ENTRY

lead_paragraph: BERNE, Switzerland, Nov. 15 -- Reports in neutral foreign diplomatic quarters here this evening state that for the fifth time since the cessation of hostilities in June, 1940, France is on the verge of outright adherence to the New Order, guaranteeing wholehearted economic and military collaboration with the Axis.
abstract: Berne neutral qrs rept Vichy will adhere to Axis new order; 5-point program outlined; Cabinet split on adherence
